title: Best of The Program | Guest: Bill O’Reilly | 1/8/21
description:
President Trump agrees to a peaceful transition to a Biden administration and denounces the Capitol rioters. Pat Gray gives his take on the Capitol chaos and Bitcoin’s insane rally. Bill O’Reilly gives his thoughts on the week and how many Americans actually support what happened at the Capitol. The Left’s attacks against conservative media have begun. BlazeTV’s Elijah Schaffer has been targeted by CNN and Rep. Eric Swalwell for documenting the Capitol riot.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
